name: PHAssetCreationRequest
desc: A request to create a new Photos asset from underlying data resources, for use in a photo library change block.

items.name: class func forAsset() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a request for adding a new asset to the Photos library using asset resources.

items.name: class func supportsAssetResourceTypes([NSNumber]) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether Photos supports creating an asset with the specified combination of resource types.

items.name: func addResource(with: PHAssetResourceType, data: Data, options: PHAssetResourceCreationOptions?)
items.desc: Adds a data resource to the asset being created, using the specified data.

items.name: func addResource(with: PHAssetResourceType, fileURL: URL, options: PHAssetResourceCreationOptions?)
items.desc: Adds a data resource to the asset being created, using the file at the specified URL.
